title: Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a player, Torching the main target, Can only be used on night 3, 6, 9 and so on.
- **Ground Pound** (1x): Roleblock all players tonight, Koopas aren't affected by this.
- **Backup Troop** (1x): This ability is replaced by another random ability from any Koopa role. The replacing ability is limited to 1 use.

desc:
Post 1422
*Mario's (25) fated enemy. Bowser the Koopa King is a foe to be feared.*
